name: Pickpocket Noir
description:
Visual bug: there's an orange-y rectangle in the middle of the screen! The rectangle is supposed to cover the whole screen. Please zoom in or out with your browser until it does. Thanks for your patience.

Made for GMTK 2022. Theme: "roll of the dice".

There's no sound!

UI clarification: at the end of each day, you can sell an item by clicking on its icon at the bottom and then pressing the sell button.

Credits:

  • Programming: SSchreyer
  • Art: Corrade
  • Font: Courier Prime

Last updated ~5:00am 18/07/2022 AEST.
